data.title: Very upscale
data.text: Excellent service.  Staff is always available and always ready to help.  The décor is tastefully done and the rooms are very comfortable and well appointed

data.title: Not as grand as expected
data.text: Food was average. Sat in first round room, non-impressive. Service was average. Too many places to dine at in Orlando- skip this one. Not horrible, but wouldn't go back

owner_response.author: Nicholas S, Manager at The Boheme, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Cloeew,

I would like to thank you for joining us, and for your feedback. We strive for excellence in our menu and our service. I sincerly hope you join us again in the future to experience what the Grand Bohemian is all about. If you would like to further discuss your experience with myself I can be reached at 407-581-4723. 

Best Regards,

Nicholas
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Excellent restaurant for Brunch and Dinner
data.text: Located across the street from the Dr. Phillips Performing art Center,  it is an Ideal place to have an enjoyable dinner prior to your performance at the theater. Good quality food, nice attractive  atmosphere and good service. Or you can wait for their incredible weekend Brunch. One of the best in town. A little pricey, but an excellent selection of very good food.

data.title: Still excellent
data.text: We come here often, and they're still excellent. They add seasonal items to the menu, such as a pumpkin vodka cocktail, and pumpkin seed salad. Waiters are excellent as well. Get the beef carpaccio appetizer, large enough for 2-3 to share.

data.title: Great food, great ambiance
data.text: I got the salmon dish and it was amazing. It really melted in your mouth. My collegue ordered the lamb chops which was also very good. The service was impeccable.

data.title: Nice place in downtown area
data.text: It was a nice place to stay and it was located downtown close to where I needed to be.  I would recommend it if in downtown Orlando.

data.title: Excellent food and fabulous wait staff
data.text:
We had the pleasure of having Samuel serve us that evening. He was wonderful and delightful. He made great recommendations from the menu and we thoroughly enjoyed our meal there. I had the crab cake and the lamp chops and they were DELICIOUS!  I love the decor and it was a great experience. 

We were at the bar before getting to our table and the bartenders were unfortunately very inattentive, contrary to what Samuel provided us.

data.title: A Delicious Welcome
data.text: The food at The Boheme is marvelous and in keeping with the standards of the Grand Bohemian hotel. The service was top notch and very friendly. They made us feel special and very welcome. The server took time to give us recommendations based on our preferences and we enjoyed everything! This is a wonderful place for that special night out.

data.title: A Superior Brunch for that Special Occasion
data.text:
We chose the Sunday brunch to celebrate my brother's and sister-in-law's anniversary. It was wonderful! The crab cakes were very meaty not to mention the other seafood items such as smoked salmon and crab legs. The prime rib was cooked to perfection. The eggs benedict was made to order and was very tasty. My absolute favorite were the crepes also made to order with fresh berries, Nutella and whip.  
The Mimosas were bottomless. The service was excellent. We enjoyed this brunch so much the next time my brother came to town we decided to do it again for no special reason!

data.title: SPECIAL
data.text: Our Judge took us out to lunch and it was absolutely Special.  The place made you feel special, classy and the price was surprisingly affordable.

data.title: Love love this restaurant!!!!!
data.text: From the ambiance to the food it was the best yet! Our server Ryan was very attentive and on spot about all menu items. Great server! Elizabeth the restaurant manager was also the same. She was making sure that all was at guest satisfaction and very kind and accommodating.The Chef who I can't remember his name , but brought our food out and all was over and beyond what we expected... OUTSTANDING, DELICIOUS  and we will be back for more pampering from the Bohemian  Restaurant!! Thank you for such a great experience!

data.title: A feast for the senses...
data.text: Boheme is the premier restaurant in downtown Orlando, in my opinion. The menu is creative, the experience is legitimately artistic without feeling contrived, and the service is superb. It's the perfect start to a wonderful night at the Grand Bohemian.

data.title: Very Classy! Convenient! Loved the restaurant!
data.text: Service was amazing, food was great and moderately priced for such a high end hotel. Everything was conveniently walking distance in Downtown so the hotel worked out perfectly.We were able to get a very good rate also as soon as we booked a more than 3 day stay - ended up working out the same price as the next best price in downtown.

data.title: A nice upstyle  spot downtown
data.text: I have meet client's and friends here for dinner and drinks. The bar is comfortable, the drinks are a decent pour and top shelf is reasonably priced. The bar food is really good. The restaurant is good, but some dishes are dressed a little more than I like to have them although guests have raved about them.

data.title: Fun in Downtown
data.text: Very nice atmosphere, fun and lively, I went with my daughter (28) and she loved it. Very pretty too.

data.title: Outstanding Brunch and Service (Renford)
data.text:
In short: you must go to their exceptional Sunday Brunch - also, ask for Renford as your server!

I'm one of those that don't mind paying a bit more for a good value and the value is certainly there. $49/pp included full breakfast buffet: standard yet exceptional usuals (eggs, sausage, bacon, etc.), charcuterie board, shellfish, made to order omelets, Belgian waffle station, prime rib, crepes, dessert bar, LIVE jazz music (grand piano, saxophone, flute), and UNLIMITED mimosas!

We had Renford as our server; he was exceptional! We were celebrating my wife's birthday and made us feel special. He had the perfect balance of attentiveness: timely cleaned off the table, offered featured items and drinks, and topping off our unlimited mimosas. Renford was a very pleasant person and you can tell he cares about doing exceptional at his job.

Valet was discounted to $8 (down from $26) with brunch validation.

We are Orlando locals and take advantage of the overwhelming restaurant options in our area. This brunch was exceptional and I know you will not be disappointed. We will be back!

data.title: Magical Dining Experience
data.text: Enjoyed an amazing evening and an even better meal. Samuel was a great server and was very attentive and knowledgeable. Our food was incredible and cooked to perfection. Highly recommend to anyone looking to treat themselves.

data.title: Great Service / Great Brunch
data.text:
Diana our server made the day for our first Sunday Jazz Brunch at the Grand Bohemian Hotel.

She made us feel so welcome and explained how the brunch worked along with the menu we had at our table.

Then suggested we get started and go to the area where the jazz was being performed and where all the food would be.

We tried so many different options.  ALL of the food was great.

Cannot wait to come back for Magical Dining.

And have Diana as our server!

data.title: Magical Dinning
data.text: We had dinner at The Boheme tonight and it was wonderful. The food was fabulous and our servers (Diana and Jill) were excellent.  The pork chops, salmon, and steak were outstanding.  The atmosphere was relaxing and we didn't feel rushed.  We will definitely return.

data.title: Best Sunday Jazz Brunch!!
data.text:
For all of the years (14 +) going to and doing business with the Grand Bohemian Hotel, today I experienced an outstanding Sunday Jazz Brunch.

Our Server Diana was the best and still is the best server in Orlando. 

But the food, display and presentation was just fantastic. So many options and so much food. It was an amazing overall experience and hope to make it back again soon.

Diana is the best, so if you dine at the Grand Bohemian Hotel (The Boheme Restaurant), make sure to ask for her as your server.
